title: New: Mykki Blanco â€“ Gay Dog Food
body:
Another update on an act covered by **Crack in the Road** earlier this year.

Mykki Blanco today announced that her forthcoming mixtape release, entitled _Gay Dog Food_, is now available to download. Check it out below (via Spotify)
